### PR checklist:

- [ ] Updated the version number [in `package.yaml`](https://github.com/spacchetti/spago/blob/master/package.yaml#L2) according to SemVer (`0.x.y.z`, `x` bumps on breaking changes, `y` on additions, `z` on patches)
- [ ] Added the change to the "Unreleased" section of the changelog
- [ ] Added some example of the new feature to the `README`
- [ ] Added a test for the contribution (if applicable)

**P.S.**: the above checks are not compulsory to get a change merged, so you may skip them. However, taking care of them will result in less work for the maintainers and will be much appreciated ðŸ˜Š
